document_name: Order No. 2017-2614 / MEADD-SG establishing the National Steering Committee of the Global Alliance Against Climate Change in Mali Phase 2 (AGCC-Mali 2)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2017/MLI-2017-08-08-Order No. 2017-2614 _ MEADD-SG establishing the National Steering Committee of the Global Alliance Against Climate Change in Mali Phase 2 (AGCC-Mali 2)_e1501d19d7a8015599380195c10fccae.pdf
document_description: This order establishes within the Ministry for the Environment, a National Steering Committee of the Global Alliance against Climate Change in Mali-Phase 2 (AGCC-Mali 2), CNPAGCC-MALI 2 program. It establishes the composition and functions of the Steering Committee.
